title: Absolutely Gorgeous 4 Bedroom 4 Bath SFR Home For Rent!
description: This elegant brick colonial is located in the highly acclaimed Central Bucks School District and sits on a spacious 3/4 acre lot. The interior boasts warm neutral colors, hardwood flooing and vaulted ceilings throughout. The beautiful eat-in kitchen is the heart of the home. It features an eat in area with a vaulted ceiling, fireplace, a large granite island, and lots of cabinetry for storing chef tools. The stainless steel apliances have all been replaced within the past few years and are a joy to cook on. The laundry room is adjacent to the kitchen and consists of a front loading washer and dryer and extra cabinet space. The family room is spacious and bright and has another fireplace for warmth and charm. Upstairs are 4 bedrooms and two full baths. The main bedroom is spacious and has a dramatic bath with a vaulted ceiling and double vanities. The additional bedrooms are all neatrally painted and offer versatility of use. The recently finished basement features vinyl plank flooring with a separate room and full bath and adds to the spacious and comfortable feel of the home. The home's roof and systems are all up-to-date, ensuring worry-free living. Conveniently located just minutes from shopping and dining in downtown Doylestown and Peace Valley Park, this home is the perfect combination of suburban living and city convenience. You will fall in love with this home, neighborhood and community as these owners have.

title: 2 bedroom 2.5 bath luxury contemporary townhome for rent
description:
Recently built 3 story, 2 Bedroom/2.5 Bath Luxury Contemporary Townhome in highly desirable section of East Falls with large fenced in, paved patio. First floor is composed of a kitchen with all black appliances with quartz countertop and back tile backsplash. Kitchen has an island and plenty of cabinets. Perfect for cooking and entertaining. Kitchen opens onto the living room and a large patio that brings the outside in. The patio has power, water, and light. Coat closet on the first floor by the front door. 2nd floor consists of a spacious bedroom with ceiling fan, private bath and large walk-in closet a beautiful powder room with window, natural stone sink and a custom wood sink counter, and a high-end washer and dryer tucked away in a closet. 3rd floor consists of a large master suite with ceiling fan, private bath, large walk-in closet and vaulted ceiling. The entire house has many large windows and is filled with light. Great curb appeal with new, wide sidewalk and a contemporary brick and corrugated metal facade. Central air & central heat.
Walking distance to train station (1/2 block away) and easy access to I76, City Line Avenue and Kelly drive. Vegan restaurant, gym, child development center in the same block. Great neighborhood feel with great amenities.
Street parking available. Dedicated outdoor parking ($75/month) or indoor parking ($150/month) is also available.

title: House for rent 4bed 3 bath
description:
New construction!! Brand new, high quality 4 bedroom 3 bath home
Proudly and meticulously constructed by Cutler Homes, Delivering high quality homes since 1987. Located in one of the hottest neighborhoods in Philadelphia, Brewerytown. This is new construction at it's finest. As you enter your new home your are greeted by the Hardwood Avalanche Natural Oak floors that flow throughout your new home on the main and upper levels. Your lovely new home is elegantly staged and you already feel like there's no place like your new home. You step into the living room and really like all of the natural sunlight coming in through the windows. Next you enter into the dining room area and start to enjoy the open floor plan that floats from the living room through the dining room area and into the kitchen with Thassos White Quartz countertop and island. Standing in your new kitchen just makes your jaw drop and mouth water as you imagine all of the meals you will prepare and enjoy in your new home. Your kitchen is complimented with shaker cabinets with slow closing drawers and stainless steel appliances that consist of refrigerator, stove, microwave, and dishwasher. You peak into the back yard and love the amount of outdoor space you have to entertain guests. You step back inside and head to the lower level which is fully finished with a den area that can be used as an exercise room, theater room, home office or whatever your imagination leads you to. The fully finished basement features a full bathroom with vanity, toilet, and a custom tiled stand up shower. You step into the fourth bedroom that can be used by guests who stay over or extend it into an in-law suite. So far you are filled with excitement and can't wait to head upstairs to check out the rest of your new home. Once at the top of the stairs of the second level, you open the hallway double doors to find a front load washer and dryer that makes it so convenient for laundry. You step into the bedroom and like how nicely sized it is with ample closet space and additional storage space on top of the closet for when switching your wardrobe from season to season. You head towards the next bedroom and stop to check out the second bathroom that features vanity, toilet, and tub/shower with custom tiled walls surrounding the tub. Now you step into the next bedroom and really like how big it is and notice that it also has a large closet with additional storage space on top of it. You head to the third level which is the master suite with walk-in closet and the master bathroom. As soon as you enter you are amazed on how big the master bedroom is and how beautifully it is staged. You walk around to take it all in from each angle and as you head into the walk-in closet you stop and can picture yourself waking up every morning to this beauty. Your master bathroom features vanity, toilet, and a massive stand up shower. You open the tempered shower glass door and it's like love at first sight. You look up and notice that the shower comes with two rain fall shower heads and this just completes your new home with the cherry on top. Now you head up to the rooftop and the views are spectacular. You are really thrilled to have toured your new home and can't wait to unpack. Your gorgeous home is located right next to 30th and Jefferson Street Park with a basketball court, baseball field, and playground. It is within walking distance to popular coffee shops, Cafe de Lave, iMunch, 29 Oxford Restaurant, Otto's Taproom, Spot Gourmet Burgers, Fit Academy, and easy access to the Art Museum, Center City, 76, and so much more. Schedule to see now and submit your application today. The keys to your new home await you....
